description: Movement restrictions in Kildare, Laois and Offaly could be applied elsewhere, health official warns.
title: Coronavirus: More Irish areas could come under Covid restrictions
title_page: Coronavirus: More Irish areas could come under Covid restrictions - BBC News
maintext: "Throughout this week, we have been testing all workers in facilities where outbreaks of Covid-19 have been identified as well as close contacts of those people who have received Covid positive results," he said.
